title: National Republican Senatorial Committee
summary:
This AO was divided into two parts, each dealing with different issues raised by a single requestor.  AO 1978-25 Part A dealt with 

contribution limits for a primary runoff election and was issued on May 12, 1978.  In Part B, the Commission concluded that the 

Colorado and Minnesota nominating conventions were not elections under FECA then determined that certain 

of the requestor's questions were hypothetical and moot, and issued this part on June 5, 1978.
